title: The Governor

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Tax (Night): Choose to tax a target tonight. Based on their alignment, the Unseen will gain a buff.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you tax a Town Support role, you gain a charge of a random GIM Investigative role that you may use alongside Tax.
- If you tax a Town Protective role, the Unseen will be granted Powerful Defense for the night.
- If you tax a Town Investigative role, the Mastermind will be informed of a convertible Town member and their role.
- If you tax a Town Killing role, the Assassin gains another charge of Lacerate.
- If you tax a Town Power role, you may choose a player to reveal their role during the day tomorrow.
- If you tax a Town Casual role, the Unseen will be informed of the roles of all players that visited an Unseen member this night.
- If you attempt to tax a non-Town member, you will lose your ability to Tax after two nights.
- You may not tax an Unseen member but like why would you
- Before your conversion, if you granted a non-Town member citizenship, your Citizen conversion will be cancelled.

desc:
Post 1185
*Is there truly even a difference between a President and a Governor? Yes. The word "the".*
